name: UICoordinateSpace
desc: A set of methods for converting between different frames of reference on a screen.

items.name: var bounds: CGRect
items.desc: The bounds rectangle describing the itemâ€™s location and size in its own coordinate system.

items.name: func convert(CGPoint, to: UICoordinateSpace) -> CGPoint
items.desc: Converts a point from the coordinate space of the current object to the specified coordinate space.

items.name: func convert(CGPoint, from: UICoordinateSpace) -> CGPoint
items.desc: Converts a point from the specified coordinate space to the coordinate space of the current object.

items.name: func convert(CGRect, to: UICoordinateSpace) -> CGRect
items.desc: Converts a rectangle from the coordinate space of the current object to the specified coordinate space.

items.name: func convert(CGRect, from: UICoordinateSpace) -> CGRect
items.desc: Converts a rectangle from the specified coordinate space to the coordinate space of the current object.
